content.raw:
I understand why I get the error.  I just think that "Reset World" should clear everything if possible, zero the controller values, and essentially re-initialize everything launched with DRC sim as if from fresh.  Obviously, anything external would need to handle the time jump.

Detecting a major jump back to zero time should be a clear special case.

This would make testing time-based calculations easier.

I'll change this to enhancement.
